attributes.action: Question the FAILINGS of Chris Grayling MP.
attributes.background: THE FAILINGS OF GRAYLING - Chris Grayling MP is failing the tax payer.  As per the NAO on the privatisation of the Probation Service £500M and more recently the £33M silence money to EuroTunnel.  Easier to pay this than the courts question tender process of additional ferry services (no deal).

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could sign this petition if you are concerned about the contract for ferries in the case of a no deal Brexit:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/236556
